      public void addDiscount(int orderDetailId, int discountPercent)
      Adds a discount to the sub-total of a specific order detail.
      Parameters:
      orderDetailId - The ID of the order detail to which the discount is to be added.
      discountPercent - The percentage of discount to be applied.
